      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location Game.createNewBoxLocation(Box box, int direction)
      Method creates and returns a new Location object according to the direction the box is being moved.
      Location Player.getLocation() 
      Location Box.getLocation() 
      Methods in dev.nethacksokoban.game with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Game.attemptBoxMove(Location newBoxLocation, Box push)
      Method attempts to move a box to a Location.
      void Game.attemptPlayerMove(Location newPlayerLocation, int direction)
      Method attempts to move player towards a new Location object.
      boolean Level.checkVictory(Location location)
      Method checks if a Location has a victory tile and then sets victory to true.
      void Level.fillTrap(Location location)
      Replaces given spot with a filled trap tile which can be moved on.
      Box Level.getBoxInLocation(Location location)
      Method searches for the right Box object which is in a certain Location
      char Level.getTileFromLocation(Location location) 
      boolean Level.isTileFreeToBeMovedOn(Location location)
      Method returns true if it's possible to move on to the tile which is given as Location object parameter.
      void Player.movePlayer(Location location)
      Sets the player location to the Location object coordinates given as the parameter and increases move count.
      void Box.setLocation(Location location)
